content:

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at The Castro at 9:00AM. Elizabeth will be at Marina District from 7:00PM to 8:45PM. You'd like to meet Elizabeth for a minimum of 105 minutes. Joshua will be at Presidio from 8:30AM to 1:15PM. You'd like to meet Joshua for a minimum of 105 minutes. Timothy will be at North Beach from 7:45PM to 10:00PM. You'd like to meet Timothy for a minimum of 90 minutes. David will be at Embarcadero from 10:45AM to 12:30PM. You'd like to meet David for a minimum of 30 minutes. Kimberly will be at Haight-Ashbury from 4:45PM to 9:30PM. You'd like to meet Kimberly for a minimum of 75 minutes. Lisa will be at Golden Gate Park from 5:30PM to 9:45PM. You'd like to meet Lisa for a minimum of 45 minutes. Ronald will be at Richmond District from 8:00AM to 9:30AM. You'd like to meet Ronald for a minimum of 90 minutes. Stephanie will be at Alamo Square from 3:30PM to 4:30PM. You'd like to meet Stephanie for a minimum of 30 minutes. Helen will be at Financial District from 5:30PM to 6:30PM. You'd like to meet Helen for a minimum of 45 minutes. Laura will be at Sunset District from 5:45PM to 9:15PM. You'd like to meet Laura for a minimum of 90 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"meetings": [{"day": "<DAY>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}

SOLUTION: After evaluating various schedules to maximize the number of friends met while respecting all constraints (availability windows, minimum meeting times, and travel times), the optimal schedule allows meeting 6 friends: Joshua, David, Stephanie, Kimberly, Lisa, and Laura. Ronald cannot be met due to insufficient time (arrival at Castro at 9:00 AM allows only 30 minutes with Ronald, less than the 90-minute minimum). Helen conflicts with Kimberly and Laura due to travel times and overlapping windows. Elizabeth and Timothy conflict with the west group meetings (Kimberly, Lisa, Laura) and cannot be included without sacrificing others.

The schedule is as follows:
- Start at Castro at 9:00 AM.
- Travel to Presidio (20 min) to meet Joshua from 9:20 AM to 11:05 AM (105 min).
- Travel to Embarcadero (20 min) to meet David from 11:25 AM to 11:55 AM (30 min).
- Free time from 11:55 AM to 3:30 PM (used for travel/waiting; no meetings possible).
- Travel to Alamo Square (19 min from Embarcadero) to meet Stephanie from 3:30 PM to 4:00 PM (30 min).
- Travel to Haight-Ashbury (5 min) to meet Kimberly from 4:45 PM to 6:00 PM (75 min; wait from 4:05 PM to 4:45 PM).
- Travel to Golden Gate Park (7 min) to meet Lisa from 6:07 PM to 6:52 PM (45 min).
- Travel to Sunset District (10 min) to meet Laura from 7:02 PM to 8:32 PM (90 min).

This schedule meets all minimum time requirements and accounts for travel times between districts.
